root: ^ A knife with a carbon steel blade and a wooden handle, which suggests the owner of the knife takes very good care of it. In history, knives could symbolize any and all stages of life. This knife specifically may symobolize an end of life stage, from the strange stains on the blade.
^What is… is that… BLOODY KNIFE!! OH MY GOD!
^It’s fine, everything’s alright. It’s just … what we found.
^That’s a knife, and it looks bloody!! So there has to have been a murder!
^We need to investigate this! It’s a good thing we’ve got a detective here tonight to help out.
^We should all split up to help investigate, since the mansion is so big. And we can help look for clues to help the detective out!
^A chivalrous plan indeed, Stubbs! I’ll be off to begin my search then.
^Ooh this is so exciting, I feel like a real investigator!
^I’ll be on my way then. Stubbs was right, we’ll need to split up to check all the rooms.
^Come on, relax a little there, detective. Nothing bad will happen. Just think of it as a fun night.
^But… alright, I guess it's time to investigate.
